sentence_zh_TW: 在電子商務中，正確處理交易文件對於業務的順利運行至關重要。
sentence: In e-commerce, correctly handling transaction ______ is crucial for the smooth operation of the business.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多觀眾喜歡觀看紀錄片，因為它們提供了對生活不同方面的深入分析和思考。
sentence: Many viewers enjoy watching a ______, as it offers in-depth analysis and reflection on various aspects of life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在一個科學研究中，每個學者都專注於特定的領域，以推進知識和發現新的理論。
sentence: In a scientific study, each scholar focuses on a specific ______ to advance knowledge and discover new theories.

sentence_zh_TW: 學習外語的目標是達到流利的表達，使學生能夠無任何障礙地進行溝通。
sentence: The goal of learning a foreign language is to achieve ______, allowing students to communicate without barriers.

sentence_zh_TW: 在物理學中，流體的特性對於理解液體和氣體的行為至關重要。
sentence: The properties of a ______ are crucial for understanding the behavior of liquids and gases in physics.

sentence_zh_TW: 工匠們經常使用鍛造技術來創造堅固且具有藝術性的金屬物品。
sentence: Artisans often use ______ techniques to create durable and artistic metal items.

sentence_zh_TW: 在編輯文章時，選擇合適的格式來提高可讀性是非常重要的。
sentence: Choosing the right ______ when editing an article is very important to enhance readability.

sentence_zh_TW: 學術論壇提供了一個平台，讓專家共享研究成果和討論新想法。
sentence: Academic ______ provide a platform for experts to share research findings and discuss new ideas.

sentence_zh_TW: 教師的角色不僅是教授知識，還是促進學生全面發展的重要支持者。
sentence: The role of a teacher is not only to impart knowledge but also to be an important supporter to ______ the holistic development of students.

sentence_zh_TW: 在比賽中，裁判必須確保所有球員遵守規則，避免任何犯規行為。
sentence: During the game, the referee must ensure that all players adhere to the rules to avoid any ______ actions.

sentence_zh_TW: 數學中，了解分數的概念對於計算和解題至關重要。
sentence: Understanding the concept of a ______ in mathematics is essential for calculations and problem-solving.

sentence_zh_TW: 在分析文本時，找到關鍵的片段可以幫助深入理解作者的意圖。
sentence: Finding key ______ while analyzing text can help in gaining deeper insight into the author's intent.

sentence_zh_TW: 制定良好的政策需要一個穩固的框架來支持計劃的實施。
sentence: Creating good policies requires a solid ______ to support the implementation of the plans.

sentence_zh_TW: 特許經營模式使企業能夠在不同地區擴展同一品牌，而不需承擔全部風險。
sentence: The ______ model allows businesses to expand the same brand in different regions without bearing all the risks.

sentence_zh_TW: 銀行業必須採取措施來防止詐欺行為，以保護客戶的資金和信息。
sentence: The banking industry must take measures to prevent ______ actions to protect customers' funds and information.

sentence_zh_TW: 在夏天，家庭聚會經常在後院的烤架上烹飪食物。
sentence: During summer, family gatherings often involve cooking food on the ______ in the backyard.

sentence_zh_TW: 即使在面對困難和嚴峻的現實時，他們的精神仍然堅定不移。
sentence: Even in the face of difficulties and ______ realities, their spirits remained unbroken.

sentence_zh_TW: 在攀岩的過程中，選擇一個好的握持是成功的關鍵。
sentence: Choosing a good ______ while rock climbing is essential for success.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個草原的粗糙外觀使它成為野生動物的天堂，吸引了各種生物。
sentence: The ______ appearance of the prairie makes it a haven for wildlife, attracting various creatures.

sentence_zh_TW: 遵循這一指導方針會幫助我們在科研項目中保持一致。
sentence: Following this ______ will help us maintain consistency in our research projects.
